Posts.Content: Oct 24, 2014 01:59PM psmartin wrote: I had an abnormal mammogram; then diagnostic mammogram and ultra sound.  Received a call that I should have a biopsy done but when I visited the surgeon he immediately told me I needed a lumpectomy.  He felt a biopsy might miss something (not be as accurate). Well, I had the lumpectomy and found out just Wednesday that it is cancer so I am thankful for his decision to do the lumpectomy.  I know face a mastectomy.  I will be fine....and you will also. Best wishes.
Posts.Title: Express lane from mammo to excision. Anyone btdt? starcloaked starcloaked
